translations: n.（Gast）（美、德、法、荷、英、瑞）加斯特（人名）

sentences.sentence: Had investors been told two years ago that crude would cost around $50 a barrel, their flabbers would not have been gasted, as Frankie Howerd, a comedian, used to say.
sentences.translation: 哪怕你两年前告知投资者一桶原油要花大概50美元，也不会惊颤他们身上的肥肉——就像谐星Frankie Howerd曾经说过的那样[1]。
